plugins.name: session
plugins.description: Flat session management system with .current-session tracking. Adapted from iannuttall/claude-sessions. Includes commands for starting, ending, updating, listing, and resuming development sessions.

plugins.name: context-handoff
plugins.description: Generic hierarchical parent-child session context handoff system. Pass context between sessions using /ctx-to and /ctx-from commands.

plugins.name: doc-tracking
plugins.description: Documentation tracking system for research sources and development prompts. Includes doc-tracker skill and commands for init/update/autotrack.
